description.value:
You emit an emotion that can influence a dreaming entity. This action behaves as one of the following maneuvers, but you cannot get any result except for a Success or a Failure. A creature cannot be under the effect of multiple Lucid Flash effects at a time. In the event a second effect affects a creature, the older effect is removed.

  • Fear: You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a creature within 30 feet of you.

  • Anxiety: You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} against a single creature adjacent to you. You can do this without any requirements for cover or needing to be outside their field of detection. On a success, you appear to them as something that is just out of the corner of their eye, distracting them enough that they lose one reaction until your next turn.

  • Lethargy: You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature you are adjacent to. A creature can attempt a Will save to escape in addition to the usual methods.
